forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock ticks into the early hours of the morning, downtown San Francisco finds itself cocooned in a gentle, almost intimate mist, with a slight chance of drizzle lingering in the air. The familiar chill wraps around you, hinting at the low temperature of about 57 degrees, while the playful westerly winds rustle softly, whispering their way through the streets at a brisk pace. While this dampness offers comfort to the city's flora, it also invites a thicker layer of fog that occasionally ebbs and flows with the currents of the wind. 

Thursday promises a delicate transformation as the sun peeks through the clouds, inviting the day to unfold under mostly sunny skies. Those who step outside will notice a gradual warming, the air feeling invigorating as the temperatures rise toward a mild 66, with an afternoon flirtation descending slightly to a cozy 64. Yet, keep an eye out for those gusty winds, which may refuse to settle, at times enhancing the atmosphere with a spirited touch. Dressing in layers will prove wise; a light jacket or cardigan to combat the morning chill will ensure comfort as one ventures into the burgeoning brightness. This day's conditions beckon leisurely strolls through the neighborhood or perhaps a visit to a quiet cafe, where one can indulge in the simple pleasure of a warm beverage while watching the city awaken. With the potential for the fog to linger, why not embrace the moments when the sun finally breaks free, casting its golden rays upon the landmarks that define this vibrant, ever-evolving tapestry of life?
